sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
      <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
        <v-toolbar-title>Gestion des Heroes</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-menu offset-y>
          <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-btn text v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
              Profile
              <v-icon right>mdi-account</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </template>
          <v-list>
            <v-list-item  @click="login">
              <v-list-item-title>Authenticated</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-menu>
      </v-app-bar>
  
      <v-main>
        <slot></slot> 
      </v-main>
    </v-app>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'MainLayout',
    data: () => ({
      loggedIn: false,
    }),
    methods: {
      login() {
        this.loggedIn = true;
        alert("Login logic goes here!");
      },
      logout() {
        
        this.loggedIn = false;
        alert("Logout logic goes here!");
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
